note: [20251216_DOCS] MCP tools inventory for v2.0.1 - identical to v2.0.0, stability release

tools_inventory.name: analyze_code
tools_inventory.description: Parse and extract code structure (functions, classes, imports)

tools_inventory.name: extract_code
tools_inventory.description: Surgical extraction by symbol name with cross-file dependency resolution

tools_inventory.name: security_scan
tools_inventory.description: Taint-based vulnerability detection (17+ types, 30+ secret patterns)

tools_inventory.name: cross_file_security_scan
tools_inventory.description: Cross-module taint tracking across file boundaries

tools_inventory.name: simulate_refactor
tools_inventory.description: Verify refactor preserves behavior before applying

tools_inventory.name: get_call_graph
tools_inventory.description: Function relationship mapping with entry point detection

tools_inventory.name: get_file_context
tools_inventory.description: Surrounding context extraction for code locations

tools_inventory.name: get_symbol_references
tools_inventory.description: Find all usages of a symbol across project

tools_inventory.name: scan_dependencies
tools_inventory.description: Vulnerable dependency detection via OSV API

tools_inventory.name: validate_paths
tools_inventory.description: Path accessibility validation for Docker/container environments
